author: Jason E. Clapham
description: Just as it says on the tin, banana-flavoured rum with aged rum and vermouth to create a deliciously banana-flavoured rum Manhattan.
name: Banana Rumhattan
recipeIngredient: 30 ml Caribbean blended rum aged 6-10 years
22.5 ml Antica Formula or other well aged sweet vermouth

recipeInstructions.text: STIR all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
